pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Plex Infusion Bonding Oil Repair Spray 100ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Extra Care PLEX INFUSION Bonding Oil Repair Spray for weak, overprocessed hair is formulated with OMEGAPLEX + AÇAI BERRY to repair broken bonds within the hair fibre for stronger and smoother hair.

Your weak, overprocessed hair can be caused by frequent heat styling or colouring. Damage can occur deep inside the hair, requiring special care to reconstruct the broken bonds within the hair fibre.

EXTRA CARE PLEX INFUSION offers:
+ BOND RECONSTRUCTION WITHIN HAIR FIBRES
+ VISIBLY IMPROVED HAIR QUALITY

Made in Australia
Bottle made from 100% recycled plastic. 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details.

Suitable For: Weak, Over Processed Hair

Product Claims: Reconstructs Broken Hair Bonds

Size: 100mL

Hair Type: Coloured or Highlighted Hair

KEY FEATURES

• Reconstructs Broken Hair Bonds
• Bottle made from 100% recycled plastic. 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details
• "EXTRA CARE formulas with LIQUID KERATIN, ADVANCED HAIR TECHNOLOGY & NATURAL ACTIVES help repair existing damage and provide protection with visibly improved hair quality."

Warnings

Keep bottle out of direct sunlight. Keep out of reach of children.

CAUTION

Keep bottle out of direct sunlight. Keep out of reach of children.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Keep bottle out of direct sunlight. Keep out of reach of children.

FLAMMABLE WARNING

No

Ingredients

Aqua (Water, Eau), Cyclomethicone, Phenyl Trimethicone, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Dimethiconol, Polyquaternium-16, Cyclomethicone, Lactic Acid, Parfum (Fragrance), Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Panthenol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Glycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Magnesium Chloride, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai berry) Fruit Extract, Magnesium Citrate, Limonene, Linalool, Geraniol, Citronellol, Benzyl Alcohol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, CI 15985 (Yellow 6), CI 19140 (Yellow 5), CI 16035 (Red 40)

Active Ingredients: Aqua (Water, Eau), Cyclomethicone, Phenyl Trimethicone, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Dimethiconol, Polyquaternium-16, Cyclomethicone, Lactic Acid, Parfum (Fragrance), Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Panthenol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Glycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Magnesium Chloride, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai berry) Fruit Extract, Magnesium Citrate, Limonene, Linalool, Geraniol, Citronellol, Benzyl Alcohol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, CI 15985 (Yellow 6), CI 19140 (Yellow 5), CI 16035 (Red 40)

Directions

"Shake well before use. Spray onto hair after shampooing and conditioning. Do not spray into eyes. USE ON: Dry or towel-dried hair. Leave in.
Keep bottle out of direct sunlight. Keep out of reach of children."

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

Keep bottle out of direct sunlight. Keep out of reach of children.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Bottle is Kerbside Recyclable. Pump & Cap can be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 1 PET(E)
